meanings.definition: Organisms that make up the base of the marine food chain.
meanings.sent1: Phytoplankters are tiny plants that float in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The phytoplankters in the ocean provide food for many marine animals.
meanings.sent3: The phytoplankters had a party at the surface of the sea.
meanings.sent4: The phytoplankters danced under the sunlight, feeding the ocean life.
meanings.sent5: The colorful phytoplankters painted the ocean with life.

meanings.definition: Planktonic organisms that photosynthesize and are crucial to ocean ecosystems.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study phytoplankters to understand ocean ecosystems better.
meanings.sent2: The health of the ocean depends on the abundance of phytoplankters.
meanings.sent3: The phytoplankters threw a photosynthesis party under the sea.
meanings.sent4: The phytoplankters are like tiny solar-powered factories in the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering phytoplankters illuminated the underwater world.
